A dose of antipoison cures poison and provides immunity to poison for 90 seconds. The next cheapest alternative, superantipoison, cures poison and provides immunity to poison for 6 minutes.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 86Buy limit: 2000Examine: 1 dose of antipoison potion.Is members only: falseIs variant of: AntipoisonImage: File:Antipoison(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.020Value: 144Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 27 February 2002Item ID: 179

An antipoison is a potion made by using unicorn horn dust on a marrentill potion (unf), requiring 5 Herblore, yielding an antipoison(3) and 37.5 Herblore experience. A dose of antipoison cures poison and provides immunity to poison for 90 seconds. The next cheapest alternative, superantipoison, cures poison and provides immunity to poison for 6 minutes.

After Barbarian Herblore Training, roe or caviar can be added to an antipoison(2), requiring 6 Herblore, yielding an antipoison mix and 12 Herblore experience. An antipoison mix has 2 doses, cures poison and provides immunity to poison for 90 seconds, and heals 3 Hitpoints.

An antipoison(1) spawn can be found in a chest in the Observatory Dungeon north-east of the stairs leading up to the Observatory.

An antipoison(3) can be purchased from The Spice Is Right for 432 coins, Jiminua's Jungle Store for 432 coins, or 374 coins when wearing any tier of Karamja gloves.

An antipoison(4) can be purchased from the Apothecary in Varrock for 5 coins, a cadava berry, and a limpwurt root.

An antipoison(4) is also a reward from Jekyll and Hyde random events if a marrentill is given to Dr. Jekyll.

Antipoison(1) spawns infinitely in the chest north-east of the stairs to the Observatory.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
3 May 2018
(update | poll)

Free-to-play players may now purchase antipoison from the Apothecary in Varrock.

15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

7 April 2016
(update)

Drinking any kind of antipoison will no longer decrease your poison immunity.

29 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

9 March 2004
(update)

The 4 dose potion was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

An '''antipoison''' is a [[Herblore#Potions|potion]] made by using [[unicorn horn dust]] on a [[marrentill potion (unf)]], requiring 5 [[Herblore]], yielding an antipoison(3) and 37.5 Herblore [[experience]]. A dose of antipoison cures [[poison]] and provides immunity to poison for 90 seconds. The next cheapest alternative, [[superantipoison]], cures poison and provides immunity to poison for 6 minutes.

After [[Barbarian Training#Barbarian Herblore|Barbarian Herblore Training]], [[roe]] or [[caviar]] can be added to an antipoison(2), requiring 6 Herblore, yielding an [[antipoison mix]] and 12 Herblore experience. An antipoison mix has 2 doses, cures [[poison]] and provides immunity to poison for 90 seconds, and heals 3 [[Hitpoints]].

An antipoison(1) spawn can be found in a chest in the [[Observatory Dungeon]] north-east of the stairs leading up to the [[Observatory]].

An antipoison(3) can be purchased from [[The Spice Is Right.|The Spice Is Right]] for {{NoCoins|432}} coins, [[Jiminua's Jungle Store.|Jiminua's Jungle Store]] for {{NoCoins|432}} coins, or {{NoCoins|374}} coins when wearing any tier of [[Karamja gloves]].

An antipoison(4) can be purchased from the [[Apothecary]] in [[Varrock]] for {{NoCoins|5}} coins, a [[cadava berry]], and a [[limpwurt root]].

An antipoison(4) is also a reward from [[Jekyll and Hyde]] [[random event]]s if a [[marrentill]] is given to Dr. Jekyll.

[[File:Antipoison spawn chest.png|thumb|right|Antipoison(1) spawns infinitely in the chest north-east of the stairs to the Observatory.]]
